trans-unit.source: Files you've previously accessed will show up here
trans-unit.target: 您最近開啟過的檔案和資料夾將顯示在此處

trans-unit.source: Open a specific page or pages

To get started, you'll need to grant us permission to display your files. This will open a Settings page where you can grant us this permission. You'll need to reopen the app once you've completed this step.
trans-unit.target: 請授權我們使用您的檔案系统。待「設定」開啟後您就可以授權給我們。您需要在完成設定後重新啟動應用程式。

trans-unit.source: is a subfolder of the source folder
trans-unit.target: 是源資料夾的子資料夾

trans-unit.source: An item with this name already exists in this directory.
trans-unit.target: 目標目錄已存在同名檔案。

trans-unit.source: We weren't able to delete this item
Please insert the necessary drive to access this item.
trans-unit.target: 請插入所需的磁碟機以存取此項目。

trans-unit.source: The file you are attempting to access may have been moved or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 目標檔案可能已被移動或刪除。

trans-unit.source: The file you are attempting to preview may have been moved or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 欲預覽的檔案可能已被移動或刪除。

trans-unit.source: The folder you are attempting to access may have been moved or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 目標資料夾可能已被移動或刪除。

trans-unit.source: The file you're trying to delete is currently being used by an another application.
trans-unit.target: 欲刪除的檔案正被其他應用程式使用。

trans-unit.source: The requested operation is not supported
The item name must not contain the following characters: \ / : * ? " < > |
trans-unit.target: 檔案名稱不可以包含下列字元： \ / : * ? " < > |

trans-unit.source: The item name must not contain the following characters: \ / : * ? " < > |
trans-unit.target: 檔案名稱不可以包含下列字元： \ / : * ? " < > |

trans-unit.source: Moving files to the Recycle Bin
trans-unit.target: 正在將檔案丟進資源回收桶

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to permanently delete all these items?
trans-unit.target: 您確定要永久刪除這些檔案?
以系統管理員身分執行

trans-unit.source: Enter password to unlock the drive
trans-unit.target: 輸入密碼以解鎖磁碟機

trans-unit.source: Please check the password and try again.
trans-unit.target: 請確認密碼並再試一次。
以另一名使用者之身分執行

trans-unit.source: Can't access any items to display
trans-unit.target: 無法存取並顯示任意項目

trans-unit.source: The source and destination file names are the same.
trans-unit.target: 此位置已經有同名的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The destination folder is the same as the source folder.
trans-unit.target: 此位置已經有相同的資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Files ran into a problem that the developers didn't prepare for yet.
trans-unit.target: Files 遇到我們未處理的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The item referenced is either invalid or inaccessible.{0}Error message:{0}{1}
trans-unit.target: 參考項目無效或無法存取。{0}錯誤訊息：{0}{1}

trans-unit.source: There's nothing to share right now...
trans-unit.target: 目前沒有任何可分享的項目…

trans-unit.source: The items you've selected will be shared
trans-unit.target: 您即將分享已選取項目

trans-unit.source: The selected item will be shared
The item you're attempting to rename no longer exists. Please verify the correct location of the item you need to rename.
trans-unit.target: 您欲重新命名的項目不存在。請確認您要重新命名的項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: The name specified was invalid. Please check the desired item name and try again.
trans-unit.target: 無效的檔名。請確認其有效性並再次命名。

trans-unit.source: The length of the item name specified exceeds the maximum limit. Please check the desired name and try again.
trans-unit.target: 新檔名的字數過長。請確認其有效性並再次命名。

trans-unit.source: The application needs to be restarted in order to apply these settings, would you like to restart the app?
trans-unit.target: 需要重啟應用程式以更改語言設定。您要現在就重啟嗎?

trans-unit.source: We weren't able to create this item
Choose a type for this new item below
trans-unit.target: 於下方選擇新項目的類型
可以安心地移除硬體了

trans-unit.source: The device can now be safely removed from the computer.
trans-unit.target: 現在可以安心地從電腦移除此硬體。

trans-unit.source: This device is currently in use. Close any programs, windows or tabs that might be using the device, and then try again.
trans-unit.target: 此裝置使用中。請關閉任何可能使用此裝置的應用程式、視窗或索引標籤，然後再試一次。

trans-unit.source: There was an issue saving some properties.
Some properties may contain personal information.
trans-unit.target: 部分屬性可能會包含個資。

trans-unit.source: Check the status of file operations here
trans-unit.target: 在此檢查檔案操作的狀態

trans-unit.source: Find out what's new in Files
Send the developers an issue report with more information
trans-unit.target: 傳送包含詳細資訊的問題回報
在 GitHub 上贊助我們

trans-unit.source: Do you want to download and install the latest version of Files?
trans-unit.target: 您要下載並安裝最新版本的 Files 嗎？

trans-unit.target: 覆蓋所有子物件的權限為此父物件的可繼承權限

trans-unit.source: We use App Center to track which settings are being used, find bugs, and fix crashes. Information sent to App Center is anonymous and free of any user or contextual data.
trans-unit.target: 我們使用 App Center 來追蹤使用者在應用程式的使用情況，並藉此查找錯誤及修復問題。所有資料都是以匿名身份回傳至 App Center，您的個人資料也不會被回傳。

trans-unit.target: 是否將程式 DPI 覆寫為目前使用的顯示器的 DPI

trans-unit.target: 將Files設為預設的檔案總管

trans-unit.target: 從工作列右鍵選單開啟資料夾時，開在新的視窗中

trans-unit.source: This option modifies the system registry and can have unexpected side effects on your device. Continue at your own risk.
trans-unit.target: 此項設定會修改您的系統檔案並有可能會有未預期的副作用。我們對於可能會發生的問題並不負責。請您僅在認知到這個動作可能帶來的問題的情況下才繼續進行。

trans-unit.source: Do not remove Files from your device without turning off this option. Not doing so will prevent you from opening File Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 停用此選項前請勿移除Files，否則你將無法開啟檔案總管。

trans-unit.source: Calculating folder sizes is resource intensive and may cause your CPU usage to increase.
trans-unit.target: 計算資料夾大小消耗較多資源，可能會導致CPU使用率上升。
